IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PENNSYLVANIA LEGAL AID NETWORK, INC. IS A CLIENT-CENTERED ORGANIZATION THAT PROVIDES LEADERSHIP, FUNDING, AND SUPPORT TO IMPROVE THE AVAILABILITY AND QUALITY OF CIVIL LEGAL AID AND DIRECT LEGAL SERVICES FOR LOW INCOME PEOPLE AND VICTIMS OF DOMESTIC VIOLENCE IN PENNSYLVANIA.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PENNSYLVANIA LEGAL AID NETWORK, INC. IS A CLIENT-CENTERED ORGANIZATION THAT PROVIDES LEADERSHIP, FUNDING, AND SUPPORT TO IMPROVE THE AVAILABILITY AND QUALITY OF CIVIL LEGAL AID AND DIRECT LEGAL SERVICES FOR LOW INCOME PEOPLE AND VICTIMS OF DOMESTIC VIOLENCE IN PENNSYLVANIA.
IRS990.Desc: THE FUNDING ADMINISTERED BY PENNSYLVANIA LEGAL AID NETWORK WAS USED TO PROVIDE LEGAL ASSISTANCE TO THE POOR IN ALL COUNTIES OF PENNSYLVANIA. SERVICE WAS PROVIDED IN 68,079 CASES.CONSUMER 5,324EDUCATION 51EMPLOYMENT 4,760FAMILY 18,816JUVENILE 1,470HEALTH 2,674HOUSING 23,314INCOME MAINTENANCE 6,258INDIVIDUAL RIGHTS 2,881MISCELLANEOUS 2,531 A BREAKOUT OF THE CASES HANDLED BY MAJOR CASE TYPE FOLLOWS: 41.8 PERCENT OF OUR CASES INVOLVED FAMILY MATTERS, 34.2 PERCENT INVOLVED SHELTER HOUSING ISSUES, 16.2 PERCENT INVOLVED INCOME ISSUES, AND 7.8 PERCENT INVOLVED CONSUMER ISSUES.GENERALLY, 70 PERCENT OF OUR CLIENTS ARE FEMALE; 60 PERCENT ARE WHITE; AND 84 PERCENT ARE BETWEEN THE AGES OF 18 AND 59.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PLAN'S EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND THE LOBBYING FIRM OF BUCHANAN INGERSOLL ENGAGE IN LOBBYING ACTIVITY FOR THE PURPOSE OF PROMOTING FUNDING TO PLAN AND TO CIVIL LEGAL AID. THESE ACTIVITIES CAN INVOLVE DIRECT LEGISLATIVE CONTACTS TO ADDRESS PLAN'S TREATMENT IN THE ANNUAL PENNSYLVANIA BUDGET, WHERE CIVIL LEGAL AID HAS TWO LINES, AND IT CAN INVOLVE ADVOCACY REGARDING THE FILING FEES THAT HELP TO FUND CIVIL LEGAL AID, KNOWN AS THE ACCESS TO JUSTICE ACT.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: LEGAL AID OF SOUTHEASTERN PA INC

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PENNSYLVANIA LEGAL AID NETWORK MONITORS THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS BY REVIEWING ALL EXPENSES CLAIMED BY GRANT RECIPIENTS. ONCE THE EXPENSES ARE DEEMED REASONABLE, PENNSYLVANIA LEGAL AID NETWORK PASSES DOWN THE MONEY TO THE RECIPIENT ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ATTORNEY BOARD MEMBERS ARE APPOINTED TO THEIR POSITIONS BY THE PENNSYLVANIA BAR ASSOCIATION. CLIENT BOARD MEMBERS ARE APPOINTED TO THEIR POSITIONS BY THE CLIENTS' COUNCIL OF PENNSYLVANIA AND THE PENNSYLVANIA STATE WELFARE RIGHTS ORGANIZATION. THE PROJECT DIRECTORS' BOARD MEMBER IS APPOINTED BY THE PENNSYLVANIA PROJECT DIRECTORS CORPORATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MINUTES ARE NOT MAINTAINED FOR EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND FINANCE COMMITTEE MEETINGS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS REVIEWED IN DETAIL BY THE BUDGET & FINANCE COMMITTEE AND A COPY OF THE 990 IS PROVIDED TO ALL BOARD MEMBERS FOR THEIR REVIEW PRIOR TO THE FILING OF THE FORM.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH BOARD MEMBER SIGNS A CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE STATEMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD EVALUATES THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND APPROVES THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S SALARY ON AN ANNUAL BASIS. A COMPARABILITY REPORT BY AN OUTSIDE CONSULTANT WAS CONDUCTED TO ESTABLISH A SALARY RANGE FOR THIS POSITION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THESE DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. ONCE REQUESTED, THE DOCUMENTS WILL EITHER BE MAILED, FAXED, OR EMAILED.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
